mapper.select: SELECT od.id, od.count, g.id AS good_id, g.gname, g.description, g.price, g.stock, g.imgPath, g.gstatus, g.kid, g.createdate FROM order_detail od INNER JOIN goods g ON od.gid = g.id WHERE od.oid = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into `order`(uid,loginName, adress, createDate, total, orderCode, status) values (#{uid},#{loginName},#{adress},#{createDate},#{total},#{orderCode},1)
insert into order_detail(oid, gid, count, total) values (#{oid}, #{gid}, #{count}, #{total})
mapper.update: update goods set stock=stock-#{count} where id=#{gid}
update goods set stock=stock+#{count} where id=#{gid}
update `order` set status = #{status} where id=#{id} and status=1
update `order` set status = #{status} where orderCode=#{orderCode} and status=1
